body:
Comment 1: 
my guess this is because ld looks for symbols that start "weak.":


		if(strncmp(s->name, "weak.", 5) == 0) {
			s->special = 1;  // do not lay out in data segment
			s->reachable = 1;
			s->hide = 1;
		}
_Labels changed: added **priority-soon**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @rsc._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
